title: How are the summer courses in pes?Is it worth the money?Do we get credits?

comments.body:
They are pretty good and yes you do get credits (if you pick the courses which have credits)

In your final semester, when you have electives for 7 and 8 semesters, you can drop a few electives because you have claimed the credits already in summer.

Eg if you claim 4 credits in summer, you can drop 4 credits worth subject in 7th or 8th sem...

I took one up after my second year to help with some work I was doing over the summer. I found parts of it useful but it was also a bit crammed. It was 8 hours for 5 days iirc. 

The big perk was that you can claim the credits in your final sem, so I didn't have to attend any classes then.
